mapper.insert: insert into comment ( content, userid, reviewid, articleid ) values ( #{content}, #{userID}, #{reviewID}, #{articleID} )
mapper.select: select COMMENTID, C.USERID,COUNTRY,DATE,CONTENT from COMMENT C inner join USER U on C.userID = U.userID where commentID = #{commentID}
